Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 739 Filed 08/10/22 Page 43 of 43 43 LBNAMAXTps
1 MS. STERNHEIM: None were communicated.
2 THE COURT: Thank you.
3 What else? Anything?
4 MS. COMEY: Nothing from the government, your Honor.
5 THE COURT: Anything from the defense?
6 MS. STERNHEIM: No. Thank you.
7 THE COURT: Give me one second?
8 Yes. Just on the point, Ms. Comey, regarding the
9 witnesses who may be recalled for rebuttal, you'll, both sides
10 will look into it, you'll confer, and when would you like to
11 put in a letter if there's disagreement?
12 MS. COMEY: May we submit it by Saturday, your Honor?
13 THE COURT: Yes.
14 MS. COMEY: Thank you.
15 THE COURT: All right. Nothing further?
16 Thank you, everyone. Have a good Thanksgiving. I'll
17 see you on Monday.
18 (Adjourned)
19
20
21
22
23
24
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00011664
